title: LoL Patch 5.6 Download very slow! (MAC)
body:
Hi Guys,

Just creating a Discussion post about the new 5.6 Patch and how it is taking a very long time to download on my Macbook Pro.
My Macbook is relatively fast, and up to date with all software Etc, However this download has reached 33%, and has just started to slowly Fluctuate download speeds (Between 0Kbps - about 45Kbps) This is most frustrating as it will slowly drop to Zero every now and then and work its way back up, only to drop back to Zero again.

I've been searching the internet all morning to try find a solution 
I have done:
 - Selected [Disable App Nap]
 - Tried restarting multiple times

Any help would be great

replies.body: Have you tried disconnecting from the internet and reconnecting while it's stuck on 0kbps? Sometimes just refreshing the connection will fix it.
